name: R5-RelatedPerson-R4B-RelatedPerson
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 RelatedPerson into FHIR R4B

element.display: A person that is related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care

target.display: A person that is related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson`

element.display: Whether this related person's record is in active use

target.display: Whether this related person's record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.active` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.active`

element.display: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited

target.display: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.address` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.address`

element.display: The date on which the related person was born

target.display: The date on which the related person was born
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.birthDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.birthDate`

element.display: A language which may be used to communicate with the related person about the patient's health

target.display: A language which may be used to communicate with about the patient's health
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.communication` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.communication`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.communication.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `RelatedPerson.communication.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.communication.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.communication.id`

element.display: The language which can be used to communicate with the related person about the patient's health

target.display: The language which can be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.communication.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `RelatedPerson.communication.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.communication.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `RelatedPerson.communication.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Language preference indicator

target.display: Language preference indicator
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.communication.preferred` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.communication.preferred`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `RelatedPerson.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: male | female | other | unknown

target.display: male | female | other | unknown
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.gender` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.id`

element.display: A human identifier for this person

target.display: A human identifier for this person
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `RelatedPerson.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `RelatedPerson.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name associated with the person

target.display: A name associated with the person
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.name`

element.display: The patient this person is related to

target.display: The patient this person is related to
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.patient` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.patient`

element.display: Period of time that this relationship is considered valid

target.display: Period of time that this relationship is considered valid
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.period` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.period`

element.display: Image of the person

target.display: Image of the person
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.photo` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `RelatedPerson.photo` - photo has change due to type change: R5 `photo` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `photo`

element.display: The relationship of the related person to the patient

target.display: The nature of the relationship
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.relationship` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.relationship`

element.display: A contact detail for the person

target.display: A contact detail for the person
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.telecom` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.telecom`

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `RelatedPerson.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `RelatedPerson.text`
